prodNameC: 英傑核酸探針式人類白血球抗原分型盤-DQB1位點
ingredientsDesc:
HLA-DQB1 Typing Kit ：1. HLA-DQB1 Master Mix - A 20mM Tris-HCL solution
containing：30% glycerol, 100mM KCL, 400uM dATP, dCTP, dGTP, 800uM dUTP, biotinylated
primers (0.5uM), 100u/ml AmpliTaq®, 0.05% sodium azide as preservative. 2. HLA-DQB1 Typing Strip - Strips in a resealable plastic tube with desiccant. 3. 6.0mM MgCl2 Solution - 6.0mM magnesium chloride solution containing 1% ProClin®300 as preservative. 4. Control DNA(6tests) - DNA form a B lympoblastiod cell in a Tris-HCL, EDTA solution containing 0.05% sodium azide as preservative. 5. HLA-DQB1 Scoresheet - A results sheet for scoring positive probe reactions. 
6. HLA-DQB1 Overlay - Clear Plastic overlay for determining probe positions.
applicantAddr: 新北市蘆洲區集賢路393號4樓
efficacy: 利用DNA檢測提供低至中解析度之HLA-DQB1分型。
mdFormat: Model：820.01(50tests/Kit) / 820.999(1000tests/Kit)RELITM SSO HLA-DQB1 Typing KitComponents：HLA Typing Strips、HLA Master Mix、6.0mM MgCl2 Solution、HLA Control DNA、HLA Instructions for Use、HLA Overlay、HLA scoresheet、Interpretation Table、Kit Component List.

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
